author: wsjcom
title: Myrmidons Are Loyal Civil Servants, but to Whom?
text:
Holman Jenkins has provided the perfect one-word description for bureaucrats—myrmidons (“Why the AT&T Case Suddenly Matters,” Business World, May 12). The problem with our myrmidons, in this case, is whether they know to whom they are supposed to be loyal. Their loyalty should be to the taxpayer, but I fear it is to the Democrats to whom they overwhelmingly pledge their alms. Here is hoping some people beside the choir are reading Mr. Jenkins.
Michael P. Carter
...
